TopicTitle: [11/26/15 Update] Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!

Articles.Content:
How much rep is needed for two bars again? 700? I forgot. Just curious.

It's 500 for light green, and 200 each step after that
Soon...

It's 500 for light green, and 200 each step after that

......

i have 699 currently....

edit: Yay two bars!

Edited February 28, 2015 by Yukon0009
I am almost one of you enlightened ones!
I'm 44 away from the last bar *begins spaming P1000 pictures*

Heheh, it feels like every Friday night, I get another light green bar.. it's insane how many people rep my summaries, I've half a mind to tell people to stop, I feel so bad having 5 green bars despite not contributing anything I see as worthwhile to the community :/

Heheh, it feels like every Friday night, I get another light green bar.. it's insane how many people rep my summaries, I've half a mind to tell people to stop, I feel so bad having 5 green bars despite not contributing anything I see as worthwhile to the community :/

Aw don't be like that, everyone likes your summaries.

Aw don't be like that, everyone likes your summaries.

Mmm, I know. But I still feel like it's not worthwhile, compared to modders like sarbian and ferram4 etc. I just listen to Max ramble for an hour and write down what he says. A gibbon could do it, yet here I am with 5 light green bars, same as NathanKell and RoverDude. Who has done more for the KSP community, me or them?

Never mind, I'll just make a note in next weeks summary to tell people to go rep someone else as well, or something. Not saying like 'don't rep me', more like 'rep other people as well'.

Edited March 1, 2015 by ObsessedWithKSP

If your stuff isn't worthwhile...........well........mine aren't much better either, to be honest.

If your stuff isn't worthwhile...........well........mine aren't much better either, to be honest.

And I'm single mindedly focused on military replicas.

At least I have my guided missiles.

I'm 44 away from the last bar *begins spaming P1000 pictures*

If wasn't me, it wouldn't exist.
